name: Vasilis
description: Vasilis is a hand-drawn adventure game. The main character – Vasilis, lost her husband – Peter, in the rebellious city center. The city is in riots for a long time and almost everyday something burns or someone dies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 610 / Intel (R) HD Graphics 5300 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1900 MB available space
